assessment_data.parent_observations: Child shows signs of anxiety and has trouble sleeping. Often startled by loud noises.
assessment_data.ai_analysis: Initial analysis indicates symptoms consistent with acute stress response. Recommend immediate support for sleep issues and anxiety management.
assessment_data.cultural_context: Recent exposure to conflict zone. Strong family support structure present.

assessment_data.ai_analysis: Presenting with separation anxiety and emotional dysregulation. Age-appropriate interventions recommended.
assessment_data.cultural_context: Recent relocation to refugee camp. Limited access to educational resources.
